entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Dauphin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:23 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dauphin Airport 05:25 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: W 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
